title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4008.3 - When foul is claimed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4008.3 - When foul is claimed

State Regulations

In the event of a foul being claimed, the word inquiry
shall be flashed forthwith on the result commission and announcement thereof
made on the public address system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4008.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
